title: any one experiencing difficulties atm?
body:
so im just in champ select and can't select a champ when it gets to my go. now im logging in but it keeps erroring with cannot conect to pvp chat and know everything is just extremely slow to load.

anyone else?

replies.body:
Hi Folks,

Just confirming we've seen that there is something negatively impacting games for some players.  Right now we're working to identify the cause of the issue.  We'll post some more updates when we have them.

Hang tight!

Cheers
Mindstar

So things seem to be stabilising at the moment, from our service monitoring it looks like potentially some kind of issue that affected players on TPG / iiNet.  Are any of you on those ISPs?

Cheers 
Mindstar
Yeah i use Internode/iiNet and was having problems earlier. I'm able to sign in again now though.
Thanks!   Good to hear!
Was dodgy for me earlier. Not letting me select champ and generally being slow around champ select but then fine in game. ISP is telstra
Telsta is joint with iinet, and they did say iinet
Hey man. I'm with Internode and am having issues. Just though I'd throw that out there.
Internode are owned by iiNet, so yeah. Same deal really.
Still having issues or is it fixed now?
Yeah, iiNet here and I was getting some sort of issue.
Hey Mindstar, I am with TPG NBN, what do you recommend me to do?

Try playing a custom and see if you can get all the way through champ select into game.  As I mentioned it looks like things are stable again, so hopefully everything will be working for you.

Let me know how you go!

Cheers
Mindstar

I'm on TPG FTTB in Sydney, I am having difficulties logging in and using client features, however once I can start searching for a game, champ select is fine. Atm log in is fine, it was quicker the last time I tried.
Would you know how to fix ping issues in peak hour by any chance? is it the servers or the ISP servers?
Ranked is still disabled?

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vaYB4nNQ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-01-07T03:38:58.909+0000)
>
> Hi Folks,
> 
> Just confirming we've seen that there is something negatively impacting games for some players.  Right now we're working to identify the cause of the issue.  We'll post some more updates when we have them.
> 
> Hang tight!
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

That generally happens when your neighbour decides that it's a good idea to download all the seasons of Doctor Who in one day, while the highest internet speed for your street is 2Mbps. No wonder I can't get outta Bronze.
i lost 3 lp .... THAT SHITS WORTH MORE THEN GOLD IN BRONZE5 RITO PLZ!

now ranked is locked because im not lvl 30 or own 16 champions.... wtf is this even
haven't seen that one in 2 years lol
Yeah... can't even log into the game client...
I cant even log in
same here. i stuck in queue now cant start
Yep I'm getting the same thing
